shri lanka padanam aayathanayedi pawathi shri lanka nidahas pakshaye madhya sakachchawedi amathiwaraya me bawa sandahan kele ya.shri lankawata me chanda wimasimedi sahaya dakwu ratawalata prashansawa puda kala amathiwaraya indiyawa apata sahaya nodakwuwath koti thrasthawadaya parajaya kirimata awasan yuddha samayedi sidu kala aadhara upakarawala kruthagnyathawaya puda karana bawath janadhipathithuma da me gana sandahan kara siti bawa da pawasiya.mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma koti thrasthawadaya paradawa 2009 mayi masaye sita uthura - nangenahira athulu rata goda nangamin jathin athara sanhindiyawa athi kirimata karagena yana wadapiliwelata manawa himikam kawunsilaya sammatha kala yojanawa nisa badhaka athiwiya haki wiya haki bawa da kiya.susil prem jayantha, anura priyadarshana yapa amathiwarun da mehidi adahas dakwuha.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
